channel.title: Subtrakt
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: Subtrakt: A New Name
item.description:
It’s official! I've changed Visualty.io to Subtrakt.io. So why did I decide to change the name of my website when I thought I had chosen a clever and strategic name? Simply put, Subtrakt is easier to spell and remember!

We all know how difficult it is to come up with a creative, memorable name that captures everything we stand for, and I’d like to think that Subtrakt does just that. I like what it means: it represents the operation of removing objects from a collection. But instead, I like to think of it as a metaphor for good design. "Less is more".

Here’s to launching the name of my website, Subtrakt. Enjoy!

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
New year, new website!

Wow! What a year it's been! Lots of exciting changes in 2015. I left my full-time job at Apple to launch my own freelance business, visited Southeast Asia for the first time, got engaged to my best friend (while also helping her start her own business Alt. Brides) and finally built my well-overdue portfolio website.

I've learned a lot in the past year, mainly, what it means to be happy and to constantly challenge myself.


What is happiness?

Coffee, pizza and beer? Well, that's just part of what it means to be happy. To me happiness is having creative freedom over every design challenge I take on. Happiness also comes from being trusted by my clients to drive design forward and make apps better. This is what I truly love and value about being a Product Designer. Being an integral part of helping companies improve their products by interweaving design-thinking into the software development process.


Just the beginning

I have ambitious plans to work hard (and smart), innovate, have fun in the process and find the right talent to help me succeed.

This is just the beginning folks. Stay tuned!
